level.heading: Emergency Legislation
level.text: For temporary (90 day) repeal of section, see § 1012(b) of Fiscal Year 2012 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2011 (D.C. Act 19-93, June 29, 2011, 58 DCR 5599).

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 19-21
level.text: For history of Law 19-21, see notes under § 38-451.
